title: The Hollows
description: Two siblings must face the world after the death of their parents as creatures seek to destroy their bloodline.Margaret Hollow wants nothing more than to raise her parents from their graves. Ezrah Hollow will stop at nothing to prevent his idiot sister from wasting more of their magic. Neither sibling can prevent Penny Oxford from dropping into their lives after being murdered. And all of them have until Halloween to solve why everyone in Arcane Society wants them dead. Who knows, maybe they’ll end up dead just by trying, solving everyone’s problems.Will Margaret be able to control herself and listen to her big brother?Will Ezrah save his sister from making the wrong choices?Will Penny figure out who made her so important to the world of Arcane?
author: Kaitlin Creeger
